snippet: The authorities found videos on the home computer of the elementary school aide that showed him molesting children at P.S. 243 in Crown Heights, Brooklyn, officials said.
abstract: The authorities found videos on the home computer of the elementary school aide that showed him molesting children at P.S. 243 in Crown Heights, Brooklyn, officials said.
lead_paragraph: A teacher's aide at a public school in Crown Heights, Brooklyn, has been arrested and accused of sexually abusing and videotaping students at the school, a law enforcement official tells SchoolBook.

headline.main: Teacher's Aide Is Accused of Sex Abuse
